#Task1

```{r}

library(survey)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)

raw_data <- read_excel("sample_school_student_list.xls", col_names = FALSE)

stratum_info <- data.frame(
  Stratum_Code = c("7", "8"),
  Description = c("Grade 7", "Grade 8"),
  Population_Size = c(93, 126),
  Sample_Size = c(17, 22),
  SECUs_per_stratum = c(1, 1)  #every grade only have one SECU
)

# sample size for each SECU
stratum_info$Sample_Size_per_SECU <- stratum_info$Sample_Size / stratum_info$SECUs_per_stratum

print(stratum_info)

```




#Task2
```{r}
#Sampling Error Computation Units (SECUs)
stratum_info <- data.frame(
  Stratum_Code = c("7", "8"),
  Description = c("Grade 7", "Grade 8"),
  Population_Size = c(93, 126),
  Sample_Size = c(17, 22),
  SECUs_per_stratum = c(1, 1)
)

stratum_info$Sample_Size_per_SECU <- stratum_info$Sample_Size / stratum_info$SECUs_per_stratum
print(stratum_info$SECUs_per_stratum)


#df

total_SECUs <- sum(stratum_info$SECUs_per_stratum)
df <- total_SECUs - nrow(stratum_info)
cat("Degrees of Freedom (df):", df, "\n")



#weighted
stratum_info$Weight <- stratum_info$Population_Size / stratum_info$Sample_Size
print(stratum_info$Weight)
```
